ISSUE.TITLE: DateTable in all grids has 4 Issues, RTL version
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 RC Steps to reproduce the problem: - Fork develop branch - Add Arabic Language (as RTL language), with localization resource. - Change language from En to Ar, And check All grids (Products, Customers, Category, Orders, ...etc. Issues: select length, total records, select all, navigation buttons Issue 1: Select input in bottom of the grid (which should select number of records per page), aren't exist. Issue 2: Total records numbers aren't exist, and replaced by variable name called "TOTAL_" Issue 3: Next & Previous buttons icons direction should be reversed. Issue 4: Checkbox that select all should be align to center of the column header.
